summary: Makes the Skull of Corruption worthy for an archmage.
descriptionHtml:
Requested from my other mod:
Better Staff of Magnus - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4476


---DESCRIPTION---
This mod improves the enchantments of the Skull of Corruption to be worthy of an Archmage.

Vanilla - 20 points damage, increases to 50 if powered with dreams collected from sleeping people.
Main - 50 points damage, increases to 100 if powered with dreams collected from sleeping people.
Medium - 30 points damage, increases to 75 if powered with dreams collected from sleeping people.

---INSTALL---
Use mod manger or place .esp into Data directory.

---UNISTALL---
Use mod manger or remove .esp from Data directory.

---UPDATE---
*As requested have uploaded medium version.
- Medium - 30 points damage, increases to 75 if powered with dreams collected from sleeping people.
author: Savage Hammer
